医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
制药工艺开发中的爆炸危险识别Scitegrity 是化学品监管合规领域的领先公司，很高兴地宣布扩大其针对制药工艺开发和安全团队的危险品评估器的版本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Explosive-Hazard-Identification-in-Pharmaceutical-Process-Development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Explosive-Hazard-Identification-in-Pharmaceutical-Process-Development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a2bf9ad-5b7d-4c5d-8acb-2aee1862130e Fri, 01 Sep 2023 10:47:00 -0400
安进在 ESC 2023 上展示最新的 2 期 olpasiran 数据安进今天在欧洲心脏病学会 (ESC) 年会上的最新科学会议上公布了 olpasiran（一种小干扰 RNA (siRNA)） 2 期 OCEAN(a)-DOSE 研究的最终分析数据。阿姆斯特丹。在停药延长期内，奥帕西兰在最后一次给药后近一年内显示出对 Lp(a) 降低的持久作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Amgen-presents-late-writing-phase-2-olpasiran-data-at-ESC-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Amgen-presents-late-writing-phase-2-olpasiran-data-at-ESC-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=388e7577-eaea-4e55-b5ed-e491252c0af2 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 09:48:00 -0400 Amgen presents late-breaking Phase 2 olpasiran data at ESC 2023
安进将在 FDA 咨询委员会会议上讨论 LUMAKRAS®（sotorasib）治疗 KRAS G12C 阳性 NSCLC 的申请安进今天宣布，美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 肿瘤药物咨询委员会 (ODAC) 将审查支持补充新药申请 (sNDA) 的数据，以全面批准 LUMAKRAS® (sotorasib) 用于既往治疗过的局部晚期或转移性成人患者2023 年 10 月 5 日的一次会议上讨论了 KRAS G12C 突变的非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Amgen-to-discuss-application-for-LUMAKRASc2ae-(sotorasib)-for-the-treatment-of-KRAS-g12c-positive-NSCLC-at- FDA 咨询委员会会议.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Amgen-to-discuss-application-for-LUMAKRASc2ae-(sotorasib)-for-the-treatment-of-KRAS-g12c-positive-NSCLC-at- FDA 咨询委员会会议.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b8b1b17-021f-4c67-a0b4-dcba59afd5ad Fri, 01 Sep 2023 09:46:00 -0400 Amgen to discuss application for LUMAKRAS® (sotorasib) for the treatment of KRAS G12C-positive NSCLC at FDA advisory committee meeting
缩小差距：产后研究为解决孕产妇肥胖问题提供了线索生活在英国高度贫困地区的肥胖女性的产后饮食模式、体力活动状况和体重变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Bridging-the-gap-Postnatal-research-offers-clues-to-tackling-maternal-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Bridging-the-gap-Postnatal-research-offers-clues-to-tackling-maternal-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c11e53dd-c9fc-4286-a8a1-1a8212f573e8 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 09:11:00 -0400 Bridging the gap: Postnatal research offers clues to tackling maternal obesity
当气温升高时，医疗风险也会随之增加。医生和护士应该更多地谈论高温吗？今年夏天开始时，一封重要的电子邮件出现在波士顿北部一小群医护人员的收件箱中。它警告说，当地气温将上升至华氏80度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/When-temps-rise-so-do-medical-risks-Should-doctors-and-nurses-talk-more-about-heat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/When-temps-rise-so-do-medical-risks-Should-doctors-and-nurses-talk-more-about-heat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af7ec85e-6e0b-41c3-98ab-5da142437d97 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 08:03:33 -0400 When temps rise, so do medical risks. Should doctors and nurses talk more about heat?
生物标志物揭示了对 COVID-19 后综合征变异性的见解研究人员对 2019 年冠状病毒病后综合症患者的前瞻性观察队列进行了研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Biomarkers-unveil-insights-into-post-COVID-19-syndrome-variability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Biomarkers-unveil-insights-into-post-COVID-19-syndrome-variability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=085e7343-5256-40d8-a8c4-926247eda631 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 08:03:00 -0400 Biomarkers unveil insights into post-COVID-19 syndrome variability
活动人士滥用联邦数据虚假声称新冠疫苗导致 676,000 人死亡Facebook 上分享的一篇博客文章声称，covid-19 疫苗已导致约 676,000 名美国人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Activist-misuses-federal-data-to-make-false-claim-that-c​​ovid-vaccines-killed-676000.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Activist-misuses-federal-data-to-make-false-claim-that-c​​ovid-vaccines-killed-676000.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=566edc5f-6a8e-4d6e-b1cf-588012c1d6dc Fri, 01 Sep 2023 08:02:15 -0400 Activist misuses federal data to make false claim that covid vaccines killed 676,000

TherageniX 和诺丁汉大学获得 99.5 万英镑的创新英国拨款，用于开发用于骨再生的粉末基因疗法来自英国创新药物制造转型计划的资金支持细胞内药物输送的创新技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/TherageniX-and-University-of-Nottingham-awarded-c2a3995K-Innovate-UK-grant-to-develop-powdered-gene-therapy-for-bone-再生.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/TherageniX-and-University-of-Nottingham-awarded-c2a3995K-Innovate-UK-grant-to-develop-powdered-gene-therapy-for-bone-再生.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d08c8a6f-75a2-4bca-994e-7731d9e0efd1 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 04:54:00 -0400 TherageniX and University of Nottingham awarded £995K Innovate UK grant to develop powdered gene therapy for bone regeneration
